While it shares the goal of building community, it is typically a university-wide event for newcomers, whereas the Korean MT is a more intimate, group-specific retreat that happens repeatedly.

source_item.foreign_context: Haute couture is the creation of exclusive, custom-fitted high-end fashion, traditionally made by hand from start to finish. It serves a very small, wealthy clientele and acts as a source of creative inspiration for the broader fashion industry.
